It contains the following functions:\\n\\n`get_chrome_options`: Sets up the Chrome options for the Selenium webdriver.\\n\\n`get_domain_data`: Retrieves the content length and link count for a given domain.\\n\\n`get_keyword_data`: Retrieves the search engine results page (SERP) data for a given keyword, including related keywords, top 10 links, and various metrics.\\n\\n`calculate_uci`: Calculates the User Confidence Index (UCI) based on the provided metrics.\\n\\n`process_keyword`: Processes a keyword by retrieving the SERP data and calculating the UCI.\\n\\n`process_domain`: Processes a domain by retrieving the content length and link count and calculating the UCI.\\n\\n`main`: The main function that orchestrates the execution of the script, including processing the domains and keywords, and saving the results to an Excel file.\\n\\nIn summary, this file is a web scraping and data analysis script that calculates the User Confidence Index (UCI) for a list of domains and keywords, and saves the results to an Excel file.\",\"/1_测试/TEST11.py\":\"`WebsiteDownloader`: A class that downloads a website and its resources (images, CSS, JavaScript, fonts, etc.) recursively up to a specified depth.\\n\\n`create_file_path`: A function that generates a file path based on the URL to maintain the directory structure.\\n\\n`download_file`: A function that downloads a single file from a given URL and saves it to the specified path.\\n\\n`download_page`: A function that recursively downloads a web page and its resources, up to the specified maximum depth.\\n\\n`start`: A function that initiates the website download process.\\n\\nThis file is a Python script that implements a website downloader. It allows the user to specify a target URL and a maximum depth for the recursive download. The script will then download the website and its resources, preserving the directory structure, up to the specified depth.\",\"/数据处理/数据处理_提款单号.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. Instead, it is a Python script that connects to a MySQL database, retrieves data from a table, and then processes and exports the data to Excel files.\\n\\nThe main steps performed in this script are:\\n\\n1. Establishing a connection to the MySQL database using the `pymysql` library.\\n2. Executing a SQL query to retrieve data from the `finance_withdraw` table in the `finance_1000` database, filtering the data based on the `draw_status` and `confirm_at` columns.\\n3. Renaming the column names in the retrieved data to more descriptive names.\\n4. Filtering the data to include only the desired columns.\\n5. Mapping the values of certain columns to more readable labels.\\n6. Exporting the processed data to separate Excel files for each site ID (1000, 2000, and 7000).\",\"/1_测试/TEST13.py\":\"There is no code provided in the given XML document, so I cannot list any class or function names. Without any actual code, I can only summarize that this file is an empty XML document that does not contain any classes or functions.\",\"/1_测试/TEST1.py\":\"This file demonstrates the use of the Jinja2 template engine to dynamically generate Python code and execute it.\\n\\n`Template`: A class from the Jinja2 library that allows for the creation of dynamic templates.\\n\\n`render()`: A method of the `Template` class that takes a dictionary of values and generates the final output based on the template.\\n\\n`exec()`: A built-in Python function that executes the dynamically generated code.\\n\\n`Person`: A dynamically generated class that has an `__init__` method to initialize the `name` attribute and a `greet` method that returns a greeting message.\\n\\n`greet()`: A method of the `Person` class that returns a greeting message based on the `name` attribute.\",\"/1_测试/练习 1.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. Defines a regular expression pattern to extract the game type from the file names.\\n4. Iterates through the files in the directory, reads the Excel files, performs some data processing (removing a column, adding a new column), and organizes the data by game type.\\n5. Writes the processed data to a new Excel file, with each game type in a separate sheet, and applies some formatting (freezing the first row, adding filters).\\n6. Prints a message indicating that the merging process is complete.\",\"/1_测试/Henvita 合拼.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes. It contains the following functions:\\n\\n`read_txt_to_df`: Reads text files in a directory and converts them into a single pandas DataFrame.\\n\\n`extract_odds`: Extracts the odds from the \\u0027game details\\u0027 column for rows where the \\u0027venue name\\u0027 is \\u0027IMTY\\u0027.\\n\\n`process_data`: Adds a \\u0027game type\\u0027 column to the DataFrame based on the \\u0027venue name\\u0027, and processes the sports data by extracting additional information from the \\u0027game details\\u0027 column.\\n\\n`export_merged_data`: Exports the processed data to an Excel file, splitting it into multiple sheets if the data exceeds the Excel row limit.\\n\\n`main`: The main function that orchestrates the data processing and export.\\n\\nIn summary, this file is a data processing script that reads text files, extracts and processes relevant data, and exports the results to an Excel file.\",\"/数据处理/数据处理_虚拟币首存存单查询.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions.
